title: Howard County Police Searching For Apple Store Thieves

organizations.name: howard county police searching for apple store thieves howard county police searching for apple

text:
Howard County Police Searching For Apple Store Thieves « CBS Baltimore 
WJZ at Orioles Spring Training: Mark Viviano reports live tonight from Florida 
February 16, 2017 9:18 AM 
Photo Courtesy: Howard County Police 
Baltimore (WJZ) – Howard County police are asking for the public’s help in identifying two suspects accused of stealing from an Apple Store. 
Police have released two surveillance photos of the suspects inside the Apple Store at the Columbia Mall. 
Anyone with information is asked to contact Howard County Police at 410-313-STOP or hcpdcrimetips@howardcountymd.gov
